amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 116-289 to require the Agency to emphasize outreach to tribal export businesses and to include in their annual report a summary of those outreach efforts and the provision of Agency support to tribal export businesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 116-289 to require the Agency to emphasize outreach to tribal export businesses and to include in their annual report a summary of those outreach efforts and the provision of Agency support to tribal export businesses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mrs. Torres (CA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
